english.segment1: My world is closing in. On the inside. But I'm not showing it. When all I am is crying out. I hold it in and fake a smile. Still I'm broken. I'm broken. Only one can understand. And only one can hold the hand. Of the broken. Of the broken
english.segment2: When no one else knows how I feel. Your love for me is proven real. When no one else cares where I've been. You run to me with outstretched hands. And You hold me in your arms. Again
english.segment3: I need no explanation of why me. I just need confirmation. Only You could understand the emptiness inside my head. I am falling. I am falling. I'm falling down upon my knees. To find the one who gives me peace. I am flying. Lord I am flying
english.segment4: When no one else knows how I feel. Your love for me is proven real. When no one else cares where I've been. You run to me with outstretched hands. And You hold me in Your arms. Again
english.segment5: I have come to you in search of faith. Cause I can't see beyond this place. Oh You are God and I am man. So I'll leave it in Your hands
